name: Sword Queens
description:
Monsters threaten the safety of the kingdom! Gather the Sword Queens to save the day! Choose from two cards drawn from the deck at a time and choose between two new Sword Queens every time you kill an enemy, but be careful! You can't see what the enemy will do!

Music Credits:  all songs are by Shihori

Update: Nerfed Goblin Commander and Added two anti-armor cards:

Assassin Queen Shoko

Ballet Queen Kassandra
